title: Eisenhower on military-indust. complex - over time

content.question: Which of the following best characterizes the military-industrial complex in the decade following Eisenhowerâ€™s speech?

choices.label: Popular protest forced greater separation between the military and industry.
Private industry lost significant influence with the federal government.
The military lost significant influence in the federal government.
The concerns about the military and industry largely persisted.

content.answer: The concerns about the military and industry largely persisted.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
